    • contains

      public boolean contains(int yr)
      This method checks if any there any books made in the year yr in the linked list
      Parameters:
      yr - year integer
      Returns:
      boolean value that represents whether the list contains the parameter

    • find

      public BookList.Node find(int yr)
      this method finds the node that has a book that was made in the year equivalent to yr.
      Parameters:
      yr - integer for the year
      Returns:
      Node that contains the book with the equivalent year

    • find

      public BookList.Node find(long isbn)
      This method finds the node of any books in the linked list that have the isbn in the parameter.
      Parameters:
      isbn - long that represents a book's isbn
      Returns:
      Node where the first occurence of a book with matching isbn

    • contains

      public boolean contains(long isbn)
      if there is a node that contains a book with the given isbn the function returns true.
      Parameters:
      isbn - , attribute of the Book Object
      Returns:
      boolean, if there is a node that contains a book with the given isbn the function returns true.

    • size

      public int size()
      finds the size of the list
      Returns:
      number of nodes.

    • insertBefore

      public boolean insertBefore(long isbn, Book b)
      Inserts a Book object before the Node that has the book record with the isbn in the parameter
      Parameters:
      isbn - Book attribute, long isbn
      b - Book object
      Returns:
      false if the head is null, or the isbn is not found

    • insertBetween

      public boolean insertBetween(long isbn1, long isbn2, Book b)
      This method inserts a node between two nodes, the two nodes are located by isbn
      Parameters:
      isbn1 - the isbn of the first node
      isbn2 - the isbn of the second node
      b - Book object
      Returns:
      boolean, returns true if the node was successfully inserted

    • displayContent

      public void displayContent()
      Displays the book Object elements onto the console.

    • txtToList

      public static BookList txtToList()
      reads the text file, then stores each line in an Arraylist and then a for loop that starts at the last index and ends at index 0 will then give us the correct BookList.
      Returns:
      BookList, LinkedList of book Objects.

    • delConsecutiveRepeatedRecords

      public boolean delConsecutiveRepeatedRecords()
      This method will remove all the consecutive repeated records.
      Returns:
      boolean, if the amount of repeated records is subtracted from the original size of the list, then the trimmed list size should be the the same as the size original size minus the number of repeated records, so the function will return true. If the method the returns false then the list head is null.

    • extractAuthList

      public BookList extractAuthList(String aut)
      This method returns a BookList containing only book records with the specified author in the parameter
      Parameters:
      aut - , the author attribute of the Book Object
      Returns:
      BookList that contains only the books of specified author

    • swap

      public boolean swap(long isbn1, long isbn2)
      This method finds two records to swap and locates each by their isbn, if both isbns are found the records are swapped.
      Parameters:
      isbn1 - the first record that you would like to swap
      isbn2 - the record that will the other record will swap with
      Returns:
      boolean, both isbns were not found or the head of the list is null the return value is false. If both the isbns were found then the swap will be successful and the function returns true.

    • commit

      public void commit()
      This uploads the current version of the file to the updated.txt file

    • addToEnd

      public void addToEnd(Book b)
      Appends the BookList. each book is added to the end of the list
      Parameters:
      b - book Object

    • clone

      public BookList clone()
      Makes a deep copy of the bookList
      Returns:
      BookList copy of the bookList
